Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the interior, flaked away in parts, is slightly grooved and covered with light-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a pale-red slip and remains of one line of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394217) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394217)
